text: Darrell Castle (born October 11, 1948) is an American politician, activist and lawyer from Memphis, Tennessee, and the 2008 vice-presidential candidate of the Constitution Party.Ballot Access News » Blog Archive » Darrell Castle is Constitution Party Vice-Presidential Nominee:. He was the party's presidential nominee for the 2016 presidential election. ==References== Category:2016 United States presidential candidates Category:2008 United States vice- presidential candidates Category:Lawyers from Memphis, Tennessee Category:Politicians from Memphis, Tennessee Category:American activists Category:1948 births Category:Living people Category:Constitution Party (United States) politicians
title: Darrell Castle
